snippet: When her husband lost his job and the bank began foreclosing on their house, Cathy Yoder turned her coupon habit into a growing business.
abstract: Amanda Fortini article on Idaho native Cathy Yoder, who turned her coupon-clipping habit into a growing business; Yoder and her business partner Monica Knight manage the Web site Fabulessly Frugal, and are part of a growing community of people for whom coupons are a significant part of making ends meet.
lead_paragraph: When her husband lost his job and the bank began foreclosing on their house, Cathy Yoder turned her coupon habit into a growing business.

headline.seo: Coupon Clipping as the Key to Economic Rebirth
headline.main: Honey, I Got a Year’s Worth of Tuna Fish
headline.print_headline: Honey, I Got a Year’s Worth Of Tuna Fish
